name: Gustavo Ruiz
title: Budtender
coverLetter: My name is Gustavo, born and raised in Los Angeles California. I like to describe myself as very outgoing, respectful and a caring individual. I'm somewhat of a perfectionist but that also could be my weakness but I like to strive for greatness and do everything the right way. Customer satisfaction is big to me and if I never knew how to do something,I always learned wheather it was by someone teaching me or on my own.
experience:
• Security Guard
  • Delivery Driver at 5 Pizzeria's(Xlixe, Garage Pizza, Amante's, Tumby's, Domino's)
  • Dishwasher for +4 years
  • Maintenance work at Equinox Gym +3 years
  • Sales in MetroPCS
  • Clean & Green (Middle School Work)
  • Worked at both Mc'Donalds & Burger King as Cashier
